attributes.action: Provide more resources to the NHS for widespread testing for Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: I believe addressing the Coronavirus outbreak will be far more effective if we have honest, open information about the extent of its transmission. We need to be able to work together as a nation to control this outbreak and safeguard our communities.
attributes.background: I would like the government to provide resources to the NHS which enable them to test all suspected cases of coronavirus not just the more serious ones which reach hospitals. I would also like resources to be provided to test all travellers into the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
